column5: www allasbandb com . Take your family, kids, pets for a vacation to Dallas, Texas and have cozy & private place to stay! You can cook for all your family, do your laundry, and have a fully furnished home! Enjoy this Guest House for your privacy! Downtown Dallas and Dallas Cowboys Stadium is only 15 min.away! Welcome to Alla's Cozy Guest House which is located only few minutes away (half a block) in walking distance from Alla's Historical Bed & Breakfast Spa & Cabana! GOOD TO KNOW: We collect 13% tax.
